评论详情: I ordered a few rings to try from this company. I have large hands with a size 6 ring finger for reference. This solitaire caught my eye because at first glance it’s simple, however if you look at the setting it’s very detailed and not simple at all. It sits high with a two carat moissanite on a thin band, meaning you can play with many different bands with small or large widths. The setting is light but most of the ones made today are, that’s just because of the price of gold. I rather like the lightness of it. It’s silver which means it’s not easy to bend as I’m VERY hard on my jewelry. It lays flat against the finger with a smooth simple band, which makes it incredibly comfortable. The moissanite shines beautifully in any light. There’s a huge difference in the warmth and brilliance of the stone when compared with the CZ. This one I will be keeping.
Beautiful no box
I absolutely love this ring it is so beautiful I have lost weight wanting something like my wedding ring order this ring you want be disappointed
I must admit the design is different but it wasn’t as beautiful as the images on the site.  The 6-prong is what captured my attention for the sturdiness of the ring.
I’ve had my ring for about a month and still love it. Goes with everything. I was worries it would be too tall and get caught on fabrics but nope, so far so good.

I'm writing this review on behalf of my better half! She absolutely loves the ring...But as advice to other women purchasing this ring...She wants to note that the ring has a "Tall Setting"...And "Can" have a tendency to get caught on something or snag on any loose material!(which could possibly cause damage to the ring!) She suggests being mindful of these facts.
The ring is stunning and the moissnite is beautiful the band is a little thin for my liking, my concern is wear and tear, dents & bent because I enjoy my jewelry with daily wear.

I’ve received many compliments on my ring and find myself just looking at it in all sorts of light.  I highly recommend this ring with it’s amazing bursts of color.

I ordered a size 4.5 and find that this ring runs slightly small (which is actually good for me since I normally wear a size 4.25). It's very pretty from the top view but I'm quite disappointed with the side view...the jewels that make up the "petals" of this flower-like style ring are very dull and don't sparkle at all; which makes the ring look cheap imo. The side jewels look alot more sparkly in my pictures than they do in real life. Not worth what I paid ($67). Will probably be returning as I'm very picky/particular about my jewelry & many other things lol.
This ring is so much prettier in person! I wanted something to wear around the house and when we go on vacation so that my real diamond ring doesn’t get any wear and tear. Perfect replacement :)
